title: Complimentary Airport Lounge Access
author: HBL
summary: The document outlines complimentary airport lounge access for HBL Platinum Credit Cardholders through Visa LoungeKey. Key features include access to select airport lounges worldwide, regardless of ticket class or airline, with complimentary services such as drinks, snacks, newspapers, Wi-Fi, and charging facilities. It specifies the process for registration, lounge access procedures, and limitations, including a maximum of six free visits per calendar year and guest policies. Important conditions and third-party service provider disclaimers are included, along with contact details for further inquiries.
